comments_since_last_sample.body:
I had observed in the previous Administration, like in Cory-Doy Laurel... it is the Vice-President Doy Laurel who is always in contrast and not in-line with the President's Leadership.
While in the case of Our Present Administration, President Duterye is the one who is hindering the Vuse-President in helping in the Problems of the country.
My gaaaawd! Atienza! Nakikilabutan ako sa sinasabi mo Pusang gala!
